prompts: Show me a psychic Pokemon that can bend spoons and has a mystical aura.
Imagine a sleek, yellow creature that uses its mind to battle foes.
Create a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature and has telekinetic powers.
Design a humanoid Pokemon with an impressive mustache and psychic abilities.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that looks both wise and mischievous.
Give me a bipedal creature that channels psychic energy through its hands.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a quirky personality.
